attributes.action: Listen to Our Pain: Take Endometriosis Seriously Now”
attributes.additional_details: For too long, women with endometriosis have been ignored, dismissed and left to suffer in silence. This disease steals years of life, dreams of motherhood, careers and dignity. No one should have to beg to be believed or wait in agony for answers. We need urgent action, compassion and proper care so women are seen, heard and treated before it is too late. Lives, families and futures depend on it.
attributes.background: Have more specialists that deal with this disease and to listen to woman whom.suffer rather than dismissed with medications before its to late to be diagnosed , where some women have died due to this disease that is like cancer

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand you are concerned about the treatment of endometriosis, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may wish to sign the following:

Fund a National Endometriosis Registry and Audit to Help Improve NHS Care
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/736164
